title: Your web3 username

verificationErrorDialog.title: Verification failed
verificationErrorDialog.resolverRequired: A valid resolver is required to complete the verification flow
verificationErrorDialog.ownerNotManager: You must be connected as the Manager of this name to set the verification record. You can view and update the Manager under the Ownership tab.

verificationErrorDialog.default: We could't verify your account. Please return to Dentity and try again.
